title: constable trundle e
body:
i know supposedly constable {{champion:48}}  is a skin in progress and will probably be released soon, and when watching the skin spotlight i noticed his pillar is just a block of ice. All of his other skins had a unique pillar..

...I feel like for this skin it might be a good idea to have a  red british phone booth pop up for his pillar. Any thoughts on this and possibly tweaking the skin?

replies.body: What do you think of the traffic cone? ^-^

Why did you use Constable Trundle for the name of the skin?

I mean, come on, it's clearly a Bobby, so why not Bobby Trundle or something who mix both :p

> Why did you use Constable Trundle for the name of the skin?
> 
> I mean, come on, it's clearly a Bobby, so why not Bobby Trundle or something who mix both :p

'Cause Trundle and Volibear are meant to be captains, not just any old officer! Besides, Trundle's name is Trundle, not Bobby! (Bad jokes are funny, right?! RIGHT?!)
yeah they are, if not french name for pool party lee sin skin would have no meaning  :p

> What do you think of the traffic cone? ^-^

It's cute, and real world applicable.

As an aside, I think "Constable Trundle's" pillar would be funnier if it was the Big Ben Clock tower at Parliament.

Then again, if this skin's recall was him summoning a Dr. Who Police Box before stepping inside and disappearing, THAT would be crazy awesome.

> > What do you think of the traffic cone? ^-^
> 
> It's cute, and real world applicable.
> 
> As an aside, I think "Constable Trundle's" pillar would be funnier if it was the Big Ben Clock tower at Parliament.
> 
> Then again, if this skin's recall was him summoning a Dr. Who Police Box before stepping inside and disappearing, THAT would be crazy awesome.

Haha, oh man, that'd be pretty cool. I'd make a witty copyright joke about Dr. Who, but I haven't seen enough of it to do so. PLEASE DON'T HIT ME.

It's a police call box from England.  They're still pretty common over there, copyrights or no.

Then again, the voice actor would also need to come back and redo all of Trundle's lines with a Monty Python "What's all this then" accent.  Too much work for a 750 skin, eh?
hate it. you guys missed a good opportunity. a police box. seriously. why even call him constable?
love the traffic cone much better than a dr who reference :)
Still reading his skin name as "Constipated Trundle"
